title: Fullbear2222
author: Fullbear2222
content: Yes powers to be knows they have to Feed those who might be competation for them.The elite rulers are the ones who don't want crisis to go much bigger.Becouse smart people from the Lower class start look at them the kings Queens and other bankers elite.When many people have nothing to lose they realize If they cheat or do anything not legal it's better then starving.The only option left are only keep the markets pumping Even more so that lower smart not educated people can make money otherwise the world can turn into ghetto when rich ones Will need to have bodyguards that's exacly like the life is in USA cities like San Francisco or Philadelphia... But all world can be turned like this If power s to be don't give money to lower class people anyways the rich elite steal this money from middle class they don't work anyways so why to be greedy ? Better share this money with uneducated lower class people So that's why the crypto stock markets and all the systems existing in the world to get basicly Free money.Also i talked with very smart uneducated lower class person he Will go to visit new York city and try to find those rich hedge funds guys and whales and make them talk he Will ask questions about what is the situation about current war and what situation excaly with btc and crypto and finally he Will go the central park he Will have the names and face photos of wall Street who use to hang out there then he Will film them while asking questions.Also some people heading to city of London to meet some fat bankers.Soon there Will be Youtube videos gona be very Funny and interesting content.This all Will show them the rich elite that they have to lower interst rates and better supply markets with capital enough so everybody will be busy by earning doing nothing so nobody dont point fingers on them.And off course they don't want that their corrupted life Will brought to daylight  but If everything will in Crisis people start going to from the poor neighbourhoods to rich ones and start wondering around and start asking questions what's going on why you guys still rich If everybody suffering from who you guys stealing or scam  AS long as markets pumping or dumping not problem becouse by short we Also make profits.What i suggest is to create besides btc and crypto another things more so we can get Free money Even more.Steal but pay % for the Lower class who might be competation to you dont worry about middle class those ones just working and watch news and pay taxes without wanting to enjoy life and money but uneducated lower class must be happy then elite rulers are happy also and streets Will be safe.
